ygData.msgSnippet: Phobia turns to exit with the two Maximals Maybe it would be wiser if one of you led the way, every bot heres on full alert looking for Predicons to scrap,

Phobia turns to exit with the two Maximals "Maybe it would be wiser 
if one of you led the way, every bot heres on full alert looking for 
Predicons to scrap, and I do happen to be a Predicon. We wouldn't 
want any unfortunate accidents now would we?" 

The alert was only part of the reason he was wary, with the threat of 
a Predicon attack, his companions would have thier weapon systems 
armed. He could easily confirm his suspicions by scanning them, but 
he didn't want them to get the wrong idea. The idea of a Maximal 
walking behind him with an activated weapon didn't ease his tension 
much either.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Kluster::
> 
> Kluster nods. "Me and Hysteria will accompany you. Blur, you and 
Savanah stay 
> here and defend the ship. We'll be back shortly."
> 
> With that, he stands up, turning to Phobia and motioning him to 
lead on.
